EmailTemplate.name: Mail to request machine code
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please share your machine details in order for us to provide you with a valid <License Key/ IXM WEB Activation key>. Follow these steps to send us the details in a fast and easy way:
Open IXM WEB and login Go to LICENSE tile and click on Activate IXM WEB Copy the Activation details that pop up and email them to support@invixium.com
For any queries, contact Invixium Technical Services Team.
